item.description:
Hi Folks - due to scheduling conflicts - have to reschedule the conference room so WE'RE MEETING WEDS AUGUST 17TH.

 

wanted to give you all a heads up on DATES for the upcoming MEETUP installments of our ongoing program

"How to Make and Use an Ebook for Lead Generation to Build an Email List"

Remember, even if you missed the first presentation, you can still participate by going to 

http://rapidebookpublishing.com and signing up for the online program. 

In fact, we encourage everyone joining in on this group learning project to sign up on the web site so we have additional ways to communicate with each other - ebook specific for the duration of this learning event- which runs now thru Future M week in Cambridge & Boston.

We created this site specifically for our MEETUP program; there are no fees involved and YOUR active dialog and participation is what will help all of us grow faster and more successful in our respective endeavors. Please post your comments on the Meetup discussion board and our blog, be an active participant, and make your contributions felt as we craft this product - and each of you crafting your own - with our BIMM crowdsourced input.
item.name: Ebooks, Lead Generation and building Power Email Lists - part 2
